page.title: 05Holidays
page.content:
74% have been away from home for a holiday within the past twelve months. 48% have been away from home for a holiday within the past twenty four months 7% have had a foreign holiday within the past twelve months 16% have had a foreign holiday within the past twenty four months
64% have visited a foreign country. Of these 45% have been to Eire 35% have been to France 35% have been to Spain 15% have visited Austria 13% have visited West Germany 12% have visited Holland 10% have visited Malta 10% have visited Switzerland 5% have visited Italy
